body.name: Portable Steamer for Clothes Steamer, 2 in 1 Travel Garment Steamer, 15s Heat Up, Handheld Steam Iron for Clothes with Storage Bag, 1000W Mini Fabric Garment Steamer for Home, Office and Travel, 120V
deliveryMessages: Or fastest delivery Thursday, February 15. Order within 10 hrs 56 mins
features: [Efficient Heating] The hand held steamer features a dual heater function that allows it to heat up in just 15 seconds. This efficient heating system is perfect for those busy moments. The hand steamer can continuously steam for a maximum of 6-8 minutes, the powerful steam easily passes through the fabric, giving you a profound cleaning experience.

[Easy to Use] This clothes steamer is designed for convenience. It is equipped with a detachable 70ml tank that can be easily removed and filled. The built-in piston device of fabric steamer makes it easy to load and unload the tank with a gentle press, making it easier for you to add water. We recommend using purified water for optimal performance.

[No Water Leakage Design] Our steam iron for clothes adopts scientific design whether it is horizontal or vertical steaming, this design greatly improves the freedom of use and without worrying about leakage. The power cord of travel clothes steamer has 6.8ft extra long cord for easy movement so that you can easily steam clothes in any situation.

[Steaming and Ironing] The portable mini steamer has a unique panel structure design that allows it to be used for both steaming and ironing. The panel temperature is constant between 220-230 Fahrenheit degrees, which effectively protects the fabric of the clothes. With this steamer, you can dry and iron your clothes immediately, allowing you to handle urgent situations calmly.

[Used on All Fabrics] Whether you are at home or traveling, this portable steamer is ideal for ironing all kinds of clothes. It can be used on all fabrics and is widely used in T-shirts, shirts, coats, wool, denim, curtains, furniture, toys, silk, lace, and more. Only use in 110-120V countries and regions such as the US, Canada, Japan.

reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars lightweight, porable, effective steamer for travelers
reviews.reviewText: The media could not be loaded. My new job needs me to travel frequently and i wanted a effective and quick steamer. Bought this one and tried it out as soon as it arrived, and it's pretty impressive. It heats up real quickly and does its job.The compact size is convenient for storage, and it effectively removes wrinkles from clothes. Overall very happy with purchase. I wish it had more water storage so it could do more in one refill but for its price, its work it.
